meanings.definition: The state of being secret or hidden
meanings.sent1: The clandestineness of the surprise party was ruined when the birthday girl found out.
meanings.sent2: The spy's success relied on the clandestineness of his operations.
meanings.sent3: The clandestineness of the ninja's movements made him accidentally bump into a wall.
meanings.sent4: The clandestineness of the forest at night felt like a protective cloak around the animals.
meanings.sent5: The clandestineness of the treasure map led to a thrilling adventure for the kids.

meanings.definition: The quality of being concealed or kept secret
meanings.sent1: The clandestineness of the hidden compartment in the bookshelf was discovered by the curious child.
meanings.sent2: The clandestineness of the affair was revealed when incriminating photos surfaced.
meanings.sent3: The clandestineness of the magician's trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The clandestineness of the password protected the sensitive information from unauthorized access.
meanings.sent5: The clandestineness of the meeting location added an air of mystery to the gathering.
